content: this text summarizes the progress of a divorce case between mr zi7n and mrs nn they have agreed to a mutual consent divorce and have settled their property and custody agreements they have divided their movable property including furniture and vehicles and allocated their debts including mortgage loans they have also agreed on the division of real estate properties and relinquished rights to inheritance and gifts the custody and visitation rights for their child have been determined as well as the financial contributions for the childs support spousal maintenance payments have been waived the agreement is final and binding but can be reviewed by a court if circumstances change significantly the agreement covers various aspects such as inheritance rights residence arrangements for children financial contributions and personal financial consequences the costs of legal counsel and immovable property are shared equally the parties will file a joint petition for divorce in the family court the notary is notifying the parties to transfer the judgment to the court of first instance and the civil status registers registration fees must be paid within a certain period of time and failure to do so will result in fines the defendants have the right to choose another notary and have legal counsel present the registration formalities have been completed and the fees have been received
